title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Take Down High-Ranking Hamas Terrorists: Inside the Joint Operations”

content.rendered:
Joint message to IDF spokesperson and Shin Bet spokespersons:

IDF and Shin Bet eliminate military operatives of the Hamas terrorist organization, who also functioned as senior officials in the Hamas police force.

In a joint operation by the IDF and Shin Bet, yesterday (Sunday) “Abu Hamed”, a terrorist named Zahar Holi, was attacked and eliminated by an aircraft of the Air Force. In addition to his role in the military wing, he served as a senior official in the Hamas police in the Central Camp. In his activity, Zahar maintained connections with other terrorists from the organization and promoted terrorist plots against the Israeli home front.

In another joint operation that was completed on Saturday, terrorist Rami Halil Faki was eliminated from the air. In addition to his role in the military wing, he served as a central terrorist in the Hamas police in the Nuseirat area. As part of his duties, he commanded a force of armed terrorists who led terrorist plots against our forces. His deputy and four other Hamas terrorists were also eliminated along with him.

Attached is footage of the elimination of terrorist Zahar Holi: https://bit.ly/3QRBzoW

Attached is footage from the elimination of a squad of Hamas terrorists, including Rami Halil Faki: https://bit.ly/3V8usK7
